name: TwinStick Fruiter
description:
Ducks are coming to take over your island!

Defend it by shooting fruit at them.

Controls: wasd to move, left click to shoot, mouse to aim

Tips:

  • The enemies only chase you and will only attack the trees if they are in the way
  • You will not get a game over if all the trees are gone
